alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:22AM CDT until July 14 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM CDT FOR DALLAM COUNTY... At 121 AM CDT, automated weather equipment reported a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Texline, or 18 miles southeast of Clayton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Texline and Ware. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
